text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar You’ve been AWOL since 1/20/17. You’ve miss-managed every key issue facing our nation, from foreign relations to the Coronavirus.Big mistake to surround yourself with incompetents like Pompeo, Navarro and Kushner.
